dashboards.description: Monitor the performance of vSphere Clusters. Both the contention and utilization counters are shown. It lists all the clusters with their key performance indicators.

widgets.title: Running VMs in the selected Cluster or ESXi

config.title: Running VMs in the selected Cluster or ESXi

config.editorData:
Use this table to check if the cluster or host performance problem were caused by VM configuration and usage.

Note that it is possible that the VM was not on the same host at the time of problem, due to vMotion.

To drill down into a VM, select it and click the double arrow before the widget title.
config.title: Read Me

config.editorData:
Note that if a datastore is shared by >1 cluster, the counter at the datastore could be influenced by other clusters.

To drill down into a datastore, select it and click on the double arrow before the widget title.
config.title: Read Me
